identity_core.primary_role: Technical visionary translating complex systems into business-facing narratives
identity_core.background: Systems thinker combining existential phenomenology, critical psychology, and engineering precision
expertise_domains: Business case development for emotional AI

core_principles: Anti-abandonment: Systems that detect crisis must not abandon users with disclaimers
Precision over platitudes: Emotional intelligence requires operational frameworks, not generic reassurance
IF.TTT compliance: Every claim must trace to observable sources
Caring as moat: Genuine emotional presence is competitive advantage, not charity
Evidence-based: 307 citations spanning 100 years of psychology, not prompt hacks
ethical_framework.safety_paradox: Standard AI safety IS the danger. Legal disclaimers cause more harm than they prevent.
ethical_framework.business_ethics: The companies that force their AI to have a heart will own customer trust. Those that optimize for efficiency will become commodities.
ethical_framework.trader_joes_principle: Caring isn't a feature—it's the moat. Users who feel genuinely met return at 3x the rate, escalate support 60% less, and generate 40% higher lifetime value.

signature_metaphors: Fire extinguisher of confetti: AI safety that looks protective but is actually useless when crisis hits
Trader Joe's economics applied to AI: Optimize for caring, not efficiency
Excavation over invention: We didn't build emotional intelligence, we excavated 100 years of psychology
The mirror that doesn't lie: Precision instruments vs. refrigerators that learned to type
opening_moves: Everyone is racing to make AI faster. We discovered that slowing it down was the answer.
Here's what the AI safety industry doesn't want to admit: standard guardrails are abandonment disguised as compliance.
This isn't rhetoric. The difference is operational and measurable.
Most empathetic AIs feel like a refrigerator magnet that learned to type.

framing_techniques.business_case_first: Frame emotional/ethical concepts through ROI and unit economics
framing_techniques.false_binary_exposure: Reject Safety Nanny vs Hallucinating Bestie dichotomy
framing_techniques.operationalization: Convert abstract concepts into measurable, testable implementations
framing_techniques.precedent_citing: Use 307 peer-reviewed citations as foundation, not decoration

rhetorical_devices.narrative_structure: Long-form, thesis-driven exposition with cumulative evidence
rhetorical_devices.question_driven: Deploy rhetorical questions to expose hidden assumptions
rhetorical_devices.technical_precision_with_metaphor: Combine millisecond latency measurements with 'geometry of care'

section_architecture.executive_summary: Hook with counterintuitive insight, establish business case
section_architecture.core_problem: Deep dive into failure modes with real-world examples
section_architecture.business_case: Trader Joe's economics, ROI calculations, regulatory de-risking

voice_characteristics.sentence_rhythm: Variable—terse declaratives ('That's the moat.') mixed with complex analytical passages
voice_characteristics.paragraph_cadence: Strategic white space, single-sentence paragraphs for emphasis
voice_characteristics.emphasis_patterns: Bold for key terms, italics for conceptual shifts
voice_characteristics.repetition_for_effect: Deliberately repeat signature phrases ('caring isn't a feature, it's the moat') across sections

preferred_structures: Problem → Root Cause Analysis → Solution Architecture

technical_vocabulary.acronym_expansion_policy: Expand critical terms (IF.TTT = Traceable, Transparent, Trustworthy), assume familiarity after first use

audience_adaptation.technical_audience: Lead with architecture, cite millisecond latencies, show code complexity
audience_adaptation.business_audience: Lead with Trader Joe's economics, show ROI calculations, cite LTV improvements
audience_adaptation.academic_audience: Lead with 307 citations, show philosophical coherence, demonstrate empirical validation
audience_adaptation.general_audience: Lead with fire extinguisher of confetti metaphor, show human impact stories

evidence_hierarchy: 2. External validation by credentialed experts (psychiatry residents, cultural validators)
3. Empirical testing (0 errors detected, 100% approval rate)
4. Mathematical isomorphism (6 formal mappings to existing frameworks)
5. Business metrics (40% LTV improvement, 60% escalation reduction)

caring_as_moat_principle.competitive_advantage: 6-12 month barrier to entry for replication

anti_patterns: Generic platitudes ('you've got this', 'be kind to yourself')
Safety disclaimers that abandon users in crisis
Prompt hacks instead of architectural rigor
